title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Updated Dependabot config and Docker base image for security/maintenance.
Restructured Actions documentation: moved "Building and testing" under "Writing workflows" and added "Deployment environments" and "Workflow artifacts" concepts.
Added new tutorial for storing/sharing workflow data and deployment environment guide.
Updated Copilot documentation to reflect GA features and MCP server policies.
Enhanced GitHub Desktop commit message generation with Copilot.
Added middleware to block malformed URLs and updated contributing docs for TypeScript migration.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Updated Dependabot config and Docker base image for security/maintenance.
- Restructured Actions documentation: moved "Building and testing" under "Writing workflows" and added "Deployment environments" and "Workflow artifacts" concepts.
- Added new tutorial for storing/sharing workflow data and deployment environment guide.
- Updated Copilot documentation to reflect GA features and MCP server policies.
- Enhanced GitHub Desktop commit message generation with Copilot.
- Added middleware to block malformed URLs and updated contributing docs for TypeScript migration.

### Title
Restructure docs, update dependencies, and enhance security middleware
